trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Niagara Falls
There were 2 other sightings in Niagara Falls on or around June 2nd 2008
Summary: pic taken at the horseshoe falls canada
divs: sighting detailsstanding at my closed hotel window at the fallsview casino hotel on 6\02\08 monday morning a 6:35 am i took 2 pics of the falls just seconds apart because it was just a nice sunny morning and the view was great.when i got home and uploaded the pics to my computer i notice this object below the falls and in the mist. the window was clear and no spots on my camera.i made some enhancement of the object and it was clear to me this was not a seagul or a helicopter.but i sent the photo to canada's civil air dept.to see if a violation of a helicopter had incured.even though i did not see or hear a helicopter that day. im sending canada's respone to my photo and my original pic and some of my enhancements....the object has this right angle probe jutting out of the top of this thing ....you decide....darryl
